name: Windows
Tweak
ConsumerFeatures
tags: Windows 10 will not automatically install any games, third-party apps, or application links from the Windows Store for the signed-in user. Some default Apps will be inaccessible (eg. Phone Link)

name: Windows
Tweak
Tele
tags: Disables Microsoft Telemetry. Note: This will lock many Edge Browser settings. Microsoft spies heavily on you when using the Edge browser.

name: Windows
Tweak
AH
tags: This erases recent docs, clipboard, and run history.

name: Windows
Tweak
Hiber
tags: Hibernation is really meant for laptops as it saves what's in memory before turning the pc off. It really should never be used, but some people are lazy and rely on it. Don't be like Bob. Bob likes hibernation.

name: Windows
Tweak
Wifi
tags: Wifi Sense is a spying service that phones home all nearby scanned wifi networks and your current geo location.

name: Windows
Tweak
DVR
tags: GameDVR is a Windows App that is a dependency for some Store Games. I've never met someone that likes it, but it's there for the XBOX crowd.

name: Windows
Tweak
LaptopHibernation
tags: Most modern laptops have connected standby enabled which drains the battery, this sets hibernation as default which will not drain the battery. See issue https://github.com/ChrisTitusTech/winutil/issues/1399

name: Windows
Tweak
EdgeDebloat
tags: Disables various telemetry options, popups, and other annoyances in Edge.

name: Windows
Tweak
IPv46
tags: To set the IPv4 preference can have latency and security benefits on private networks where IPv6 is not configured.

name: Windows
Tweak
Teredo
tags: Teredo network tunneling is a ipv6 feature that can cause additional latency, but may cause problems with some games

name: Windows
Tweak
DisableBGapps
tags: Disables all Microsoft Store apps from running in the background, which has to be done individually since Win11

name: Windows
Tweak
DisableFSO
tags: Disables FSO in all applications. NOTE: This will disable Color Management in Exclusive Fullscreen

name: Windows
Tweak
RemoveCopilot
tags: Disables MS Copilot AI built into Windows since 23H2.

name: Windows
Tweak
UTC
tags: Essential for computers that are dual booting. Fixes the time sync with Linux Systems.

name: Windows
Tweak
Display
tags: Sets the system preferences to performance. You can do this manually with sysdm.cpl as well.

name: Windows
Tweak
DisableWpbtExecution
tags: If enabled then allows your computer vendor to execute a program each time it boots. It enables computer vendors to force install anti-theft software, software drivers, or a software program conveniently. This could also be a security risk.

name: Windows
Tweak
RazerBlock
tags: Blocks ALL Razer Software installations. The hardware works fine without any software.

name: Windows
Toggle
BingSearch
tags: If enable then includes web search results from Bing in your Start Menu search.

name: Windows
Toggle
NumLock
tags: Toggle the Num Lock key state when your computer starts.

name: Windows
Toggle
VerboseLogon
tags: Show detailed messages during the login process for troubleshooting and diagnostics.

name: Windows
Toggle
StartMenuRecommendations
tags: If disabled then you will not see recommendations in the Start Menu. | Enables 'iseducationenvironment' | Relogin Required.

name: Windows
Toggle
HideSettingsHome
tags: Removes the Home page in the Windows Settings app.

name: Windows
Toggle
SnapWindow
tags: If enabled you can align windows by dragging them. | Relogin Required

name: Windows
Toggle
SnapFlyout
tags: If enabled then Snap preview is disabled when maximize button is hovered.

name: Windows
Toggle
SnapSuggestion
tags: If enabled then you will get suggestions to snap other applications in the left over spaces.

name: Windows
Toggle
MouseAcceleration
tags: If Enabled then Cursor movement is affected by the speed of your physical mouse movements.

name: Windows
Toggle
StickyKeys
tags: If Enabled then Sticky Keys is activated - Sticky keys is an accessibility feature of some graphical user interfaces which assists users who have physical disabilities or help users reduce repetitive strain injury.

name: Windows
Toggle
HiddenFiles
tags: If Enabled then Hidden Files will be shown.

name: Windows
Toggle
ShowExt
tags: If enabled then File extensions (e.g., .txt, .jpg) are visible.

name: Windows
Toggle
TaskbarSearch
tags: If Enabled Search Button will be on the taskbar.

name: Windows
Toggle
TaskView
tags: If Enabled then Task View Button in Taskbar will be shown.

name: Windows
Toggle
TaskbarWidgets
tags: If Enabled then Widgets Button in Taskbar will be shown.

name: Windows
Toggle
TaskbarAlignment
tags: [Windows 11] If Enabled then the Taskbar Items will be shown on the Center, otherwise the Taskbar Items will be shown on the Left.

name: Windows
Toggle
DetailedBSoD
tags: If Enabled then you will see a detailed Blue Screen of Death (BSOD) with more information.
